item.description:
Join members and friends of the congregation on Tuesday, December 21st at 7PM for a special service as we welcome back the Sun, in observance of the Winter Solstice. The Yule season is full of magic, much of it focusing on rebirth and renewal, as the Sun makes its way back to the earth and the days start to get longer.

All ages are invited and participants are encouraged to bring snacks for a brief social following the service which will be held at the UU Church of Haverhill, 16 Ashland St, Haverhill Ma. Sponsored by the MoonPool coven.
item.name: Winter Solstice/Yule Service
